rooms.description: North-facing entrance hall ensuring good Vastu alignment with a spacious open area for receiving guests.
Brutalist style living room with exposed concrete finishes and minimalistic design, promoting modern aesthetics.
Dining area adjacent to the living room with raw materials in line with Brutalist architecture and functional layout.
Functional kitchen designed in a Brutalist style, featuring industrial finishes and efficient space utilization. The kitchen opens to the dining area.
Two-car garage with reinforced concrete structure, ensuring safety and durability in a Brutalist style.
Primary bathroom in common area serving guests and family with essential amenities, designed for efficiency.

openings.description: North-facing entrance door providing natural light and energy flow per Vastu.
Large window in living room for balanced daylighting.

rooms.description: Spacious master bedroom with integrated walk-in closet and private balcony. The layout adheres to Vastu principles by orienting the bed towards the east.
Additional bedroom with natural ventilation and minimalistic design, following Vastu alignment.
Third bedroom ensuring ample space for family members, designed with Brutalist features and functional layout.
Fourth bedroom complementing the overall design, integrating robust concrete elements and efficient space utilization.
Fifth bedroom providing a quiet retreat with an emphasis on minimalist decor, aligned with Vastu guidelines.
Sixth bedroom designed for comfort and privacy. The orientation supports Vastu principles by focusing on eastern exposure.
Secondary bathroom with modern fixtures, ensuring privacy and convenience for the upper floor occupants.

openings.description: Window in master bedroom to maximize natural light and ensure Vastu compliant alignment.
Windows in other bedrooms for balanced daylighting and ventilation, following Brutalist design principles.

rooms.description: Private gym with high ceiling and reinforced flooring for heavy equipment, designed with a Brutalist aesthetic. The space is optimized to provide privacy.
Utility room adjoining the private gym for storage of gym equipment and supplies, featuring functional design.

openings.description: Window in the private gym to ensure adequate natural ventilation and daylighting.

rooms.description: Service area for storage, laundry, and additional utilities. Designed with robust concrete finishes in line with Brutalist style.

openings.description: Basement window ensuring ventilation and adherence to safety norms.
